get.description:
Get all members of a council.
Only council members can view the member list.

schema.title: Response Get Council Members Api V1 Councils  Council Id  Members Get

get.description:
Get councils and activity report status for a specific year.
- Regular users can only view their own councils
- Admins can view any user's councils by providing user_id query param

post.description:
Submit an activity report for a council, year, and month.
Only the council leader can submit reports.
Includes receipts with line items and member attendance records.

get.description:
Get the activity report for a council, year, and month.
Only council members can view reports.

patch.description:
Confirm the authenticated user's own attendance for a report.
Members can only confirm their own attendance record.

Reject the authenticated user's attendance confirmation for a report.
Resets confirmation status back to PENDING.
Members can only reject their own attendance record.

post.description:
Create a DM room with a user, or return the existing one.
Requires mutual follow and no blocks.

Join the club's chat room. Creates the room if it doesn't exist yet.
Requires club membership.

get.description:
List all chat rooms the user is a member of.
Ordered by most recent message.

Get paginated messages for a club chat.
Uses club member identity (anonymous nickname/avatar when set).

Get paginated messages for a chat room.
Uses cursor-based pagination (pass last message ID as cursor).

post.description:
Send a message to a chat room.
Must provide at least message text or file_urls.

patch.description: Update a draft academic report. Cannot edit after final submission.

post.description: Finalize and submit an academic report. Cannot be undone.
Enable academic monitoring for a user for a specific year.

delete.description: Disable academic monitoring for a user for a specific year.

get.description: Get all years a user is monitored for.

Get dashboard summary of all user activities with unified monthly structure.
Each month contains both council_report and academic_report status side by side.
List all mandatory activities. Only admins can perform this action.

schema.title: Response List Activities Api V1 Reports Mandatory Admin Activities Get

post.description: Create a mandatory activity. Only admins can perform this action.

get.description: Get a mandatory activity by ID. Only admins can perform this action.

delete.description: Delete a mandatory activity by ID. Only admins can perform this action.

get.description: List all submissions for an activity. Only admins can perform this action.

schema.title: Response List Submissions For Activity Api V1 Reports Mandatory Admin Submissions  Activity Id  Get

get.description: Get all mandatory activities and user's submissions for a given year.
Get a single activity and user's submission.

post.description: Create a submission for a GOAL type activity.
Create a submission for a SIMPLE_REPORT type activity.
Create an empty submission for a URL_REDIRECT type activity (to track user started).

patch.description: Update a draft GOAL submission. Cannot update after submission.
Update a draft SIMPLE_REPORT submission. Cannot update after submission.

post.description: Finalize and submit a GOAL or SIMPLE_REPORT submission. Cannot be undone.
Mark a URL_REDIRECT submission as complete.
